item.title: [Hyperion]Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:1, topic:443002”]Ok, so I have been trying to get an interface to open for quite a while, and can’t seem to get it, here is my sendInterface method,

	public ActionSender sendInterface(int id) {
		PacketBuilder bldr = new PacketBuilder(97);
		bldr.putShort(id);
		player.getSession().write(bldr.toPacket());
		player.getInterfaceState().interfaceOpened(id);
		return this;
	}

When trying to access it through a command, it just throws a T1 error and crashes the client, any help?[/quote]

Maybe the interface doesn’t exist?

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ok, so I have been trying to get an interface to open for quite a while, and can’t seem to get it, here is my sendInterface method,

	public ActionSender sendInterface(int id) {
		PacketBuilder bldr = new PacketBuilder(97);
		bldr.putShort(id);
		player.getSession().write(bldr.toPacket());
		player.getInterfaceState().interfaceOpened(id);
		return this;
	}

When trying to access it through a command, it just throws a T2 error and crashes the client, any help?
